about_the_game:
ENTERTAINING AND ENGAGING STORY

Welcome to the best four years of your life. As an innocent freshman, you arrive at San Vallejo College with the whole world in front of you. Naive and unaware, you quickly learn that life on campus is entirely what you make of it. Will you end up being just another Joe College, or will you lead your fraternity to the crown and become campus royalty?


PLAY YOUR WAY

College Kings puts you in control of your college experience. At every turn, you’re confronted with choices that could alter the course of your time at San Vallejo - so it’s up to you to choose wisely. Everything you do impacts the world around you. You decide whichever characters you like and which to ignore from the wide variety of content available.


IMMERSIVE & INTERACTIVE SEX SCENES

Become immersed in interactive sex scenes that put you at the centre of the action and the scene selector lets you relive your favourite moments in all of their glory. This is your chance to live out the ultimate college experience - so get ready to be immersed into the world of College Kings.


REALISTIC CHARACTER PERSONALITIES & RELATIONSHIPS

College Kings puts you in control of your college experience and relationships. Meet a cast of stunning girls with unique personalities, build authentic connections, live out your sexual fantasies and ultimately, fall in love. Explore the college in free roam, interact with characters that feel like real people and unlock their storylines to further your relationship.


MEANINGFUL CHOICES & OUTCOMES

Explore the social dynamics of college through countless choices. The choices you make will impact your reputation. As your story unfolds, your reputation will dictate how people perceive you, and which opportunities are presented to you, including the ability to unlock unique scenes or progress with certain characters.


At every turn, you are confronted with choices that could alter the course of your time at San Vallejo College - so it is up to you to choose wisely.


BECOME THE FIGHT KING

An immersive fighting mode brings your story to life with challenging and rewarding gameplay. The game includes unique game mechanics, hidden content and side stories resulting in hours of unpredictable and hilarious gameplay. You will see something new each time you play.


GAMEPLAY FEATURES

  • Detailed character personality and relationship system changes how the story unfolds.
  • Active pathing based on player choices dictates how the story unfolds and relationships.
  • Immersive and interactive sex scenes that put you at the centre of the action.
  • Unique fighting mode offers a challenging but rewarding experience.
  • Scene selector to relive your favourite moments and explore new choices and outcomes.
  • Real life mode forces you to live with your choices and impact on reputation.
  • Unique game mechanics, hidden content and side stories resulting in hours of unpredictable and hilarious gameplay.


ABOUT COLLEGE KINGS

College Kings is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel which means the core gameplay is focused on point-and-clicking and enjoying the story. In this game, you dive into a world of parties, sex and love as a college freshman and make your fantasies come true.


In College Kings, you play as a young freshman attending college, and the choices you make will affect the characters you interact with, your relationships and how your college adventure unfolds. This game includes all three Episodes for free to play.

College Kings Act I, Act II and Act III, which was split across three Steam stores and game downloads, has now been combined into College Kings - The Complete Season with one Steam store and game download for a better gaming experience. College Kings - The Complete Season is free to play.

content_descriptors.notes:
College Kings contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old. 
All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: College Kings - The Complete Season

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Sexo Explícito
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas ilícitas

reviews:
“A solid beginning to this series that makes me want more”
8/10 – Gamespot

“Great visual interactive novel”
8.2/10 – Metacritic

“Amazing writing quality for this kind of visual novel, with a well-structured story that knows how to remain captivating for a long time”
8.5/10 – IlVideoGioco
short_description: College Kings - The Complete Season (Acts I-III Combined): Sex, girls, parties, and power. As a freshman at San Vallejo College, you have the whole world in front of you. Will you let the next four years pass you by, or will you lead your fraternity to the crown and become campus royalty?
